title: Lotto Number Generator
description: Generate random lotto numbers within your chosen range. Create multiple tickets at once and copy the results to share.
helper: Set the range and ticket count, then tap Generate.

validation.range: Minimum number must be smaller than maximum.
validation.picks: You are picking more numbers than the available range.
validation.tickets: Ticket count must be between 1 and 20.

openGraph.title: Lotto Number Generator
openGraph.description: Free online lotto number generator. Set your range and ticket count to instantly get random picks. Copy and share your results in one tap.
